title: Black platebody (g)

properties.value: Black platebody (g) is a part of black gold-trimmed armour and a reward from easy Treasure Trails. It has the same stats as a normal Black platebody, and requires level 10 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

Item ID2591

Black platebody (g) is a part of black gold-trimmed armour and a reward from easy Treasure Trails. It has the same stats as a normal Black platebody, and requires level 10 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-30-15
 Defence bonuses
+41+40+30-6+40
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platebody's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15.

(update)

The item was graphically updated.

It has the same stats as a normal [[Black platebody]], and requires level 10 [[Defence]] to wear.
